name: Tank Shooter (Niflax)
description:
This is a Top down shooter (because this is the only game genre I know how to make ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ ), you just shoot on the enemies, you survive the longer you can and that's it.

Controls:

Up and down to look around
Right to shoot

This is a game made for the NOKIA 3310 JAM 3

Have fun!!!
